Contents:
1. HSW duet_erc MPP rules
2. IVB MPP (not much really)
3. SKL duet AIP cheat sheet

1. HSW MPP concepts:
Violation   - is presented in the Duet Gui.
Relation    - is created for pair of signals. One is non-supply interface signal and another is supply or non-supply signal. Relation can not be resolved to assertion on the current level and is added to the collateral file to be resolved upper.
Assertion   - is created for pair of supply interface signals. Usually assertion is accompanied by violation   
	      and is used to propagate upper information about existing prohibited connections. 
	      At FC level assertion can be resolved or transformed to the FC violation. 
	      Assertion is added to the collateral file and can not be waived/excluded.

HZ is High Impedance connection between two signals (nets). This relation is order dependent. 
    First net should be powered first. Example is a gate and diffusion
BHZ is same as HZ, but between bulk and diffusion. (bulk should be powered first apparently)
LZ is Low Impedance connection between two signals (nets). This relation is not order dependent.
    Example is a relation between two diffusions of the same transistor
Example:
  <relation type=LZ p1=vcc_in p2=out />
  <relation type=HZ p1=in p2=vcc_in1 /> 
  <relation type=HZ p1=in p2=vcc_in2 />


HSW assertions:
<assertion type=power_master|greater_or_equal|power_gate|uhv|ehv|highv|nomv|lowv|
	diffusion_connected_supplies p1=string p2=string />

power_master - temporal. First signal should powered before the second:
#     <assertion type=PM p1=vcc_in1 p2=vcc_in />
power_gate   - same as power_master but voltages are related via power gate
greater_or_equal - level. Min-of-Vcc1 must be greater than Max-of-Vcc2.
	      Required if power-domain of the PMOS bulk is different from the power-domain of the diffusion
	      in order to avoid forward biasing
uhv, ehv, highv, nomv, lowv - some pins of level shifters need to be connected to certain voltage level only
#HIGH_VOLTAGE_LIMIT_ERC = 1.2
    UHV_LIMIT_ERC          = 1.89
    EHV_LIMIT_ERC          = 1.6
    HIGHV_LIMIT_ERC        = 1.05
    NOMV_LIMIT_ERC         = 0.65
see MPPBaseCheck for more  



HSW rules:
/p/hsw/pu_tu/prd/duet_queries/6.91p4.p52/ERC/
BDW duet archive:
/p/bdw/archive/subblock/block_name/duet_erc/
# ERC/MPP
ruleset=GlobalPowerRename
ruleset=LocalSupplyConnection
ruleset=MPPBaseCheck
#ruleset=MPPFoundBBWoSupplyXml
ruleset=MPPHierCellWoSupplyXml


MPPBaseCheck
  gate2diff
    Different Supplies at gate and Diffusion (HZ relation between signal and supply).
    Power_Master assertion to guarantee that vcc@gate is a superset of the vcc@diff to avoid crow-bar currents 
  bul2diff
    Power_Master assertion to guarantee that vcc@bulk is a superset of the vcc@diff to avoid crow-bar currents 
    Greater_Equal assertion to guarantee that vcc@bulk >= vcc@diff. The comparison check is within limits
  diffusion_connected_supplies
    check that only one is active (for power muxes for instance)
  supply_xml_power_master - From lower hier, either as an assertion, or relation (HZ/BHZ)
    E.g. HZ(x, Vcc1) && LZ(x, Vcc2); or BHZ(y, Vcc1) && LZ(y, Vcc2)
  supply_xml_assertion_${type}
  supply_xml_assertion_same_supplies_${type}  2 power pins of nested block A are connected to the same pin in parent block
  power_master_assertion_cyclic_depend, greater_or_equal_cyclic_depend
    E.g. PM(vcc1,vcc2); PM(vcc2,vcc3); PM(vcc3,vcc1) or same with greater_or_equal instead of PM
  bulk_not_vss	- for NMOS devices
  dangling_fub_out_pin	- Flags output pin not connected to supply by diffusion
  fet_bulk_net_wo_possupp, hier_cell_bulk_net_wo_possupp  - PMOS bulk should be connected to possup
  gate2diff_ncap, vss_gate2diff_ncap, gate2diff_pcap, vss_gate2diff_pcap
    To the best of my understanding P should be connected to VSS and N to VCC (Xtor cap related)




2. IVB duet rules:

VccConnectedToData  Vcc pins which receives Data signals. 
DataConnectedToVcc  Data pins connected to Vcc .
SoftVcc		    Gate should not be connected to vcc.
PPLevelShifter	    Passes where driver min Vcc < receiver max Vcc with different voltage parent.
PPIsolation	    Require logic isolation on interface

3. SKL AIP rules:
/p/mpg/proc/common2/utils/tool_utils/duet_queries/5.1/aip1.init
FanoutLimit = 50
FaninLimit = 50
LEGAL_SPEC_TYPES = "^possupp$|^negsupp$|^qualified_clock$"
WEAK_DRIVER_THR = 80
DanglingOutLegalName = "nocon|no_con"
AIPWeakDriver   recommended  (checks that Ctot/Zeff ratio < 80) 
SupplyNamingConvention  checks that all supplies are marked either possupp or negsupp and if marked the name starts with vcc or vss
PmosB








3. SKL DUET AIP 
Running duet for sklip:
uesetup -p sklip -hp sklip -pr 1272.4 -milestone CDR1 -m ckt_model -t analog -n <area name> -b aips  -d
    -b analog          will load all analog libraries
    -b fivrana         will load all fivr related libraries
    -b pad:pll         will load both pad and pll related libraries  

set cell = <AIP block name>
make sure exists: ${WORK}/netlists/tango/${cell}.sn
#run:
$PROJECT_DUET/utils/run_duet_aip -cell $cell -ruleset aip1 -gentextreports

after the first duet run:
cp ${WORK}/duet/report/template_${cell}_spec.init ${WORK}/duet/control/template_${cell}_spec.init   
duet -violdb ${WORK}/duet/report/${cell}_viol_db
check-in: $PROJECT_DUET/utils/aip_archive_ci.pl -cell .

embed'><b><u>DESCRIPTION<i><o:p></o:p></i></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i>Create new database object. <o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i>
– database object<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>name <o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=GramE><i>database</i></span><i> file path –
path to database file.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u>FUNCTIONS<o:p></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u><o:p><span style='text-decoration:none'>&nbsp;</span></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>createTable</span> <i>table fields<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Create new table. If table already exists the
function will fail.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>e.x</i></span></span><span
class=GramE><i> :</i></span><i> <span class=SpellE>dbObj</span> <span
class=SpellE>createTable</span> <span class=SpellE>myTable</span> {{a text} {b
real}…}.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>deleteTable</span><i> table<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Delete table. No error will return if table doesn't
exist.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>dumpTable</span><i> table<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Dump table in the form of list. Each element in list
is a list of cells.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>emptyTable</span><i> table<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Cause cleaning data in specified table. An error
will occur if table doesn't exist.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>execSql</span><i> <span class=SpellE>sql</span><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Execute a <span class=SpellE>sql</span> query.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getFile</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return the <span class=SpellE>sqlite</span> file
name.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getTableFields</span><i> table<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return specify table field.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getTables</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return all tables names.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>insertTableFields</span><i> table <span class=SpellE>data_lists</span><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Insert records to a specify table.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>e.x</i></span></span><span
class=GramE><i> :</i></span><i> <span class=SpellE>dbObj</span> <span
class=SpellE>insertTableFields</span> <span class=SpellE>myTable</span>
{{'string' 1} {'<span class=SpellE>stringb</span>' 2}}.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>isExistsTable</span><i> table<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return true if specify table exists, other false.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>dbObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>selectTable</span><i> table ?what? ?conditions?<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return result of a select query<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>e.x</i></span></span><span
class=GramE><i> :</i></span><i> <span class=SpellE>dbObj</span> <span
class=SpellE>selectTable</span> <span class=SpellE>myTable</span> &quot;*&quot;
&quot;field='value' &quot;.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center dir=LTR style='text-align:center;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=GramE><b><u><span style='font-size:24.0pt'>query</span></u></b></span><b><u><span
style='font-size:24.0pt'> object<o:p></o:p></span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u><o:p><span style='text-decoration:none'>&nbsp;</span></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u>NAME <o:p></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u><o:p><span style='text-decoration:none'>&nbsp;</span></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=GramE>query-</span><i> class to maintain duet query</i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u>SYNOPSIS<o:p></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u><o:p><span style='text-decoration:none'>&nbsp;</span></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=GramE>query</span><i> <span class=SpellE>qryObj</span> &lt;query
path&gt; &lt;database&gt;<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u>DESCRIPTION<i><o:p></o:p></i></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u>FUNCTIONS<o:p></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><b><u><o:p><span style='text-decoration:none'>&nbsp;</span></o:p></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getDatabase</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return database handler associated with the query
object. <o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getDescription</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query description.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getFields</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query fields.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getFieldsType</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query &lt;field type&gt; in list form.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getInit</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return init handler which is associated with the
query.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getKeys</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query keys.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getName</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query name.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getPath</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query full path.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getScript</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query script.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getSeverity</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query severity.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getThreshold</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query thresholds as defined in query init
file.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getType</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><i>Return query type.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:
.5in;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=GramE><i>self</i></span><i>
– standalone query .<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:
.5in;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=GramE><i>register</i></span><i>
– callback function , will be called from central loop.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getViolations</span><i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>Return complete list
of violations.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span lang=HE dir=RTL><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>qryObj</i></span></span><i> </i><span
class=SpellE>getViolationsPerKey</span><i> key<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:
embed'><i><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>Return violation with
constrains key should be in the form of <span class=SpellE>sql</span>
constrains.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:left;direction:
ltr;unicode-bidi:embed'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><i>e.x</i></span></span><span
class=GramE><i> :</i></span><i> <span class=SpellE>qryObj</span> <span
class=SpellE>getViolationsPerKey</span> &quot;field='value' &quot;.<o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal dir=LTR style='text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:

HSW MPP concepts:
Violation   - is presented in the Duet Gui.
Relation    - is created for pair of signals. One is non-supply interface signal and another is supply or non-supply signal. Relation can not be resolved to assertion on the current level and is added to the collateral file to be resolved upper.
Assertion   - is created for pair of supply interface signals. Usually assertion is accompanied by violation   
	      and is used to propagate upper information about existing prohibited connections. 
	      At FC level assertion can be resolved or transformed to the FC violation. 
	      Assertion is added to the collateral file and can not be waived/excluded.

HZ is High Impedance connection between two signals (nets). This relation is order dependent. 
    First net should be powered first. Example is a gate and diffusion
BHZ is same as HZ, but between bulk and diffusion. (bulk should be powered first apparently)
LZ is Low Impedance connection between two signals (nets). This relation is not order dependent.
    Example is a relation between two diffusions of the same transistor
Example:
  <relation type=Â“LZÂ” p1=Â“vcc_in2Â” p2=Â“outÂ” />
  <relation type=Â“HZÂ” p1=Â“inÂ” p2=Â“vcc_in1Â” />
  <relation type=Â“HZÂ” p1=Â“inÂ” p2=Â“vcc_in2Â” />


HSW assertions:
<assertion type=power_master|greater_or_equal|power_gate|uhv|ehv|highv|nomv|lowv|
	diffusion_connected_supplies p1=string p2=string />

power_master - temporal. First signal should powered before the second:
#     <assertion type=Â“PMÂ” p1=Â“vcc_in1Â” p2=Â“vcc_in2Â” />
power_gate   - same as power_master but voltages are related via power gate
greater_or_equal - level. Min-of-Vcc1 must be greater than Max-of-Vcc2.
	      Required if power-domain of the PMOS bulk is different from the power-domain of the diffusion
	      in order to avoid forward biasing
uhv, ehv, highv, nomv, lowv - some pins of level shifters need to be connected to certain voltage level only
#HIGH_VOLTAGE_LIMIT_ERC = 1.2
    UHV_LIMIT_ERC          = 1.89
    EHV_LIMIT_ERC          = 1.6
    HIGHV_LIMIT_ERC        = 1.05
    NOMV_LIMIT_ERC         = 0.65
see MPPBaseCheck for more  



HSW duet rules

hsw rules:
/p/hsw/pu_tu/prd/duet_queries/6.91p4.p52/ERC/
# ERC/MPP
ruleset=GlobalPowerRename
ruleset=LocalSupplyConnection
ruleset=MPPBaseCheck
#ruleset=MPPFoundBBWoSupplyXml
ruleset=MPPHierCellWoSupplyXml


MPPBaseCheck
  gate2diff
    Different Supplies at gate and Diffusion (HZ relation between signal and supply).
    Power_Master assertion to guarantee that vcc@gate is a superset of the vcc@diff to avoid crow-bar currents 
  bul2diff
    Power_Master assertion to guarantee that vcc@bulk is a superset of the vcc@diff to avoid crow-bar currents 
    Greater_Equal assertion to guarantee that vcc@bulk >= vcc@diff. The comparison check is within limits
  diffusion_connected_supplies
    check that only one is active (for power muxes for instance)
  supply_xml_power_master - From lower hier, either as an assertion, or relation (HZ/BHZ)
    E.g. HZ(x, Vcc1) && LZ(x, Vcc2); or BHZ(y, Vcc1) && LZ(y, Vcc2)
  supply_xml_assertion_${type}
  supply_xml_assertion_same_supplies_${type}  2 power pins of nested block A are connected to the same pin in parent block
  power_master_assertion_cyclic_depend, greater_or_equal_cyclic_depend
    E.g. PM(vcc1,vcc2); PM(vcc2,vcc3); PM(vcc3,vcc1) or same with greater_or_equal instead of PM
  bulk_not_vss	- for NMOS devices
  dangling_fub_out_pin	- Flags output pin not connected to supply by diffusion
  fet_bulk_net_wo_possupp, hier_cell_bulk_net_wo_possupp  - PMOS bulk should be connected to possup
  gate2diff_ncap, vss_gate2diff_ncap, gate2diff_pcap, vss_gate2diff_pcap
    To the best of my understanding P should be connected to VSS and N to VCC (Xtor cap related)




2. IVB duet rules:

VccConnectedToData  Vcc pins which receives Data signals. 
DataConnectedToVcc  Data pins connected to Vcc .
SoftVcc		    Gate should not be connected to vcc.
PPLevelShifter	    Passes where driver min Vcc < receiver max Vcc with different voltage parent.
PPIsolation	    Require logic isolation on interface

3. SKL AIP rules:
/p/mpg/proc/common2/utils/tool_utils/duet_queries/5.1/aip1.init
Running duet for sklip:
uesetup -p sklip -hp sklip -pr 1272.4 -milestone CDR1 -m ckt_model -t analog -n <area name> -b aips  -d
    -b analog          will load all analog libraries
    -b fivrana         will load all fivr related libraries
    -b pad:pll         will load both pad and pll related libraries  

set cell = <AIP block name>
make sure exists: ${WORK}/netlists/tango/${cell}.sn
cp ${WORK}/duet/report/template_${cell}_spec.init ${WORK}/duet/control/template_${cell}_spec.init
after the first duet run:
cp ${WORK}/duet/report/template_${cell}_spec.init ${WORK}/duet/control/template_${cell}_spec.init   
duet -violdb ${WORK}/duet/report/${cell}_viol_db
check-in: $PROJECT_DUET/utils/aip_archive_ci.pl -cell .
